api_list.name: Get OS-Browsers
api_list.description: Fetch all os browsers combinations available on lambdatest platform.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lambdatest-screenshot.p.rapidapi.comhttps://api.lambdatest.com/screenshots/v1/os-browsers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lambdatest-screenshot.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
